description.h2: The XBRL instance documents in a submission must be XBRL 2.1 valid.
description.p: Each instance document in the filing is tested separately for XBRL 2.1 validity. In order to increase the likelihood that XBRL documents within an EDGAR submission pass validation, filers are encouraged to validate their XBRL documents for compliance with the XBRL 2.1 Specification prior to submission.
REMARK: XBRL 1.0 Dimensional validity is required also.
REMARK: This obviously does not test all XBRL 2.1, only those areas that have been known to cause problems.
REMARK: At this time, only one instance is allowed per submission.
REMARK: Variation 009gd assumes there is no units registry yet implemented.

variation.name: 6.4.3, Invalid id attribute value inside appinfo element, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Invalid id attribute value inside appinfo appinfo element, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.4.3, Invalid unit (USD/Shares) for monetary item, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Invalid unit (USD/Shares) for monetary item, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.4.3, Use of a custom label role without a roleRef, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Use of a custom label role without a roleRef, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.4.3, Violation of period start strictly-less-than period end constraint in XBRL 2.1, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Violation of period start strictly-less-than period end constraint in XBRL 2.1, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.4.3, Violation duplicate roleRef in linkbase constraint in XBRL 2.1, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Violation duplicate roleRef in linkbase constraint in XBRL 2.1, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.4.3, Violation duplicate roleRef in instance constraint in XBRL 2.1, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Violation duplicate roleRef in instance constraint in XBRL 2.1, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.4.3, Two axes with the same domain, GOOD.
variation.description: Two axes with the same domain, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.4.3, A custom role unused in presentation linkbase but the roleRef points nowhere, NOGOOD.
variation.description: A custom role unused in presentation linkbase but the roleRef points nowhere, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.4.3, An iso4217 QName not representing a currency code, GOOD.
variation.description: An iso4217 QName not representing a currency code, GOOD (because no units registry; else NOGOOD under 6.5.35).

variation.name: 6.4.3, Duplicate arcs in presentation, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Duplicate arcs in presentation (called out in 6.9.1), NOGOOD.
